author: USA TODAY, William Cummings and Savannah Behrmann, USA TODAY
title: Stimulus checks are going out to people who have died, what that means for relatives
description: As many receive payments from the federal government, some have been surprised to discover that their dead loved ones also were sent the funds.
content:
When you get your stimulus check and how much you get depend on several factors.
USA TODAY
WASHINGTON As many Americans receive $1,200 payments from the federal government to help offset the impacts of the coronavirus pandemic, some have been surprised to d… [+5588 chars]
